article.title: Imperial to Support Manned and Unmanned Armament Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Imperial Machine and Tool Company, Columbia, New Jersey, was recently awarded a nearly $10 million contract to provide for manufacturing and prototyping in support of various manned and unmanned armament systems. U.S. Army Contracting Command, Picatinny, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
